41.eng-name: The Book of al-Fara' and al-'Atirah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Al-Malih, from his father, that:the Prophet forbade (the use of) the hides of Predators. (Hassan)

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ الاِنْتِفَاعِ، بِجُلُودِ السِّبَاعِ
chapter.eng-name: Prohibition Of Making Use Of The Hides Of Predators
